extendedInfo.description: For the first time ever, FORT BOYARD is available on Android.Fancy getting your hands on plenty of Boyards? Then take the challenge! Choose a team of six people and launch your offensive on the Fort in an adventure combining intelligence, strength and agility. Relive the highlights of the TV series with 24 challenges specifically adapted for touchscreen devices, including Cylinders, Power Pedal, Spiders, Sticks and much more.Collect the famous keys, solve the Professor's riddles and defeat the Masters of Time before facing the ultimate challenge in the Treasure Room with its coveted Boyards!"FEATURES:- Adventure mode identical to the TV series, including the quest for keys, the hunt for clues and the Council Room.- Quick game mode with 24 challenges taken straight from the TV series, with Cylinders, Power Pedal, Spiders, Descending Rope and visual puzzles.-  48 riddles from the Professor.-  Game help system to make progress easier.-  5 teams of candidates each with their own specific attributes.-  4 difficulty levels - easy, normal, hard and expert.-  Unlockable elements - new teams, tiger's heads, clues, jokers, extra puzzles, and more.-  Share your score on Facebook and Twitter."

reviews.title: brill game
reviews.comment: best game ever played in my life
reviews.author: siobhan campbell

reviews.title: Game ok
reviews.comment: Ok game... i cant change the language to french though
reviews.author: Rajeev c

reviews.title: Great game true to tv show
reviews.comment: Really enjoyed this, high quality app, English support as well as other languages. Facebook and Twitter support for high scores. Difficulty settings and different length game options.  A great buy for fans of the show.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Booo!
reviews.comment: I was excited about this and paid for it..I\'m really disappointed and the shooting ones don\'t work at all on my phone.... I would like a refund.. if not...yesterday was good and worth the adds...this game has No rewards whatsoever.
reviews.author: Sarah Loftus

reviews.title: Game never start Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Cannot play the game it never load the game after the initial selection!
reviews.author: St\303\251phane Desrochers
